name: NearDeathExperiencePodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Near Death Experience Podcast”
”Alexa, start Near Death Experience Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Near Death Experience Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: near death experience podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Near-Death Experience Podcast is an exploration of the experiences of those who have passed on to the other side (died, or come close to death), and who had some kind of experience while their body was unconscious, and then were revived and returned to life. The purpose of this program is to learn what we can about life in that spiritual world, and what it can teach us about how to live best in this one.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask NearDeath Experience Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask NearDeath Experience Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
